name: simple_circle
code:
set color red
set size 10
draw circle x=50 y=50

name: color_change
code:
set color blue
set size 5
draw circle x=10 y=10
set color green
draw circle x=20 y=20

name: simple_repeat
description: Use repeat to draw multiple shapes

name: repeat_with_math
description: Use math expressions in repeat loop

name: trigonometric_pattern
variable_assignment
code:
var radius 15
set color teal
set size radius
draw circle x=0 y=0

name: conditional_drawing
description: Use if/else to conditionally draw (v2 feature)

name: function_definition
transforms_rotation
code:
set color navy
rotate 45
draw square x=0 y=0

name: transforms_scale
code:
set color crimson
scale 2
draw circle x=20 y=20

name: spiral_pattern
description: Create a basic spiral using polar coordinates

name: grid_squares
code:
set color teal
set size 6
repeat 4 {
  draw square x=-30+$i*20 y=-30
  draw square x=-30+$i*20 y=-10
  draw square x=-30+$i*20 y=10
  draw square x=-30+$i*20 y=30
}

name: nested_circles
description: Draw three concentric circles at origin
code:
set color blue
set size 30
draw circle x=0 y=0
set size 20
draw circle x=0 y=0
set size 10
draw circle x=0 y=0

name: radial_burst
description: Create radial pattern of lines or shapes

name: sine_wave
description: Draw shapes along a sine wave path
goal: Test sine function for wave patterns

name: flower_petals
description: Create flower with center and petals
goal: Test combining radial and centered shapes
code:
set color pink
set size 8
repeat 8 {
  draw circle x=cos($i*45)*30 y=sin($i*45)*30
}
set color yellow
set size 12
draw circle x=0 y=0

name: color_gradient
code:
set color red
set size 10
draw circle x=-30 y=0
set color yellow
draw circle x=0 y=0
set color green
draw circle x=30 y=0

name: phyllotaxis_pattern
description: Create sunflower seed pattern using golden angle

name: square_frame
goal: Test square rendering with size variation
code:
set color black
set size 40
draw square x=0 y=0
set size 30
draw square x=0 y=0
set size 20
draw square x=0 y=0

name: checkerboard_pattern
code:
set color black
set size 8
repeat 4 {
  draw square x=-24+$i*16 y=-24
  draw square x=-16+$i*16 y=-16
  draw square x=-24+$i*16 y=-8
  draw square x=-16+$i*16 y=0
}

name: lissajous_curve
ring_of_squares
description: Arrange squares in a circular ring

name: growing_sizes
offset_ripples
description: Create ripple effect from multiple centers

name: rose_curve
description: Create a mathematical rose curve pattern
